headline: I Squared-backed BDx aims to open a dozen more data centres in Indonesia
summary: BDx Data Centers, the largest data centre operator in Indonesia, is aiming to open a dozen data centres in the Southeast Asian nation with a target of 250 megawatts of capacity within the next two...
